name: Unauthorized Access
description: Unauthorized access to Protected Health Information (PHI) due to weak authentication mechanisms

name: Data Breach
description: Accidental or intentional disclosure of PHI to unauthorized individuals

name: Inadequate Encryption
description: Transmission of PHI without encryption or security protocols

name: Insufficient Access Controls
description: Lack of role-based access control (RBAC) and user authentication

name: Password Weakness
description: Use of weak passwords or lack of password management policies

name: Unencrypted Device Storage
description: PHI stored on unencrypted mobile devices or removable media

name: Lack of Audit Controls
description: Insufficient audit logging and monitoring of PHI access

name: Insecure Data Disposal
description: Improper destruction or disposal of PHI in physical or electronic form

name: Unsecured Communication
description: Unencrypted email or messaging systems transmitting PHI

name: Missing Business Associate Agreement
description: Third-party vendors without proper HIPAA Business Associate Agreements

name: Inadequate Staff Training
description: Lack of HIPAA compliance training for workforce members

name: Unpatched Systems
description: Systems running outdated or unpatched software with known vulnerabilities

name: Absence of Contingency Plans
description: No disaster recovery or business continuity plans

name: Inadequate Physical Security
description: Unsecured server rooms or network closets with PHI storage
